name: Match Cute Pets
description:
Match Cute Pets Pc version

A match three game for cute pets. Collect as many as you can before the time runs out. This game is not finished but close and ready to test play. It has 40 levels of  Dialog and 70 game ready levels to enjoy.

There are some spelling errors now, but we are fixing this issue today.

The html 5 version needs work and better placement, I am working this out.

Donate

We are asking kindly for donations for development, anything helps.

Please donate so we can afford to publish this game and you will be listed in the credits. And get free updates for life with free in store content.
